```{r}
slm <- lm(Intentions_2 ~ .,data = survey_tbl %>% select(-ID) %>% unique() %>% select_if(is.numeric) %>% replace(is.na(.),0))
summary(slm)
```

```{r}
shapiro.test(rstandard(slm))
hist(rstandard(slm))
plot(slm)
```

Residual normality fails...
